website_summaries.verdict: One of the best car battery chargers available. Makes a great portable option when you need a charger for long trips and commutes, and comes at a low price.
pros: Will charge a typical car battery in around five hours
Comes with several different connection attachments including direct battery clamps and a cigarette input plug to charge from the interior
cons: Takes longer to charge than larger battery car chargers

customer_reviews.title: have 8 other units..
customer_reviews.text: have 8 other units..all of our garden tractors and atv's boats and snowmobiles have this charger hooked to them all winter
customer_reviews.author: jsauer750

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but no trickle charge indicator.
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use. The alligator clips are large and easy to attach. The manual says that it automatically switches to a trickle charge once the battery is fully charged. You have to take that on faith as there is no indicator that shows trickle charge mode. There are two settings 2amp and 8 Amp for rapid charge. Presumably the unit switches to trickle charge once fully charge on either setting, but the lamp still stays lit on 8 Amp or 2 Amp. Also there is no indicator to tell you the state of your battery (i.e. its 25% charged, 50% charge etc.) as some other units do.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than my old charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger will get the job done and one of the best things about it is if you have a vehicle that has an always on cigarette lighter you can plug it up into that and leave and forget it will maintain a good charging level for your battery. Has to setting you can set it to one to trickle charge to maintain charge level or a semi fast charge level for quick charging. The amount of time i have had this charger it has worked great with no problems at all so i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Did not lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: I used my unit for less than a year during that time i only used it 10 times top until it stopped working. Quality is definitely not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Handles charging a car battery perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Charged my 12v car battery over the course of a day. It trickle charges slowly but gets the job done. Its small in size so it's very easy to store and for the price I absolutely couldn't ask for more. Great item to buy if you're looking to charge your car battery when you're not in a hurry. No longer need to go to a local auto parts to get a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Celicarunner

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: So i had my 100 AH marine battery at 100% a few weeks ago, pluged this in to 8 amps, after around 14-15 hours there was a red light saying the polarity was wrong.... uhhh no.... so i unplugged the unit and plugged it back in and in like 2 mins it said full charge, so i switch to maint... so far its still full charge and maintaining ...but that polarity incorrect light has me a little bothered.........
customer_reviews.author: Ak907

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hot and smell burning on 8amp charging
customer_reviews.text: It got extremely hot when I set it on 8amp charging but not 2amp. My wife smelled it burning in the garage and got scare so she trashed it. The price is right but who wants it when it gets burn when you set it at 8amp charging.
customer_reviews.author: CarNut

customer_reviews.title: I do  NOT recommend Stanley 8amp charger.Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks , then would no longer trickle charge , would then shut off and make repeated clicking noises . Would not trickle charge thereafter .Also appeared to be an open box unit not new as stated Arrived in generic box not original manufacture box, appeared to show signs of prior handling From other reviews , this Stanley 8 amp charger has a poor reliability record. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: DeBee

customer_reviews.title: Hook it up, plug it in and forget it.
customer_reviews.text: This devise keeps my "sit in my garage" car charged up and ready to start with a bang. This car is our back up car and before we hooked up he maintainer we had a dead battery in a matter of weeks. I bought another one to keep my emergency battery charged and ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: Works part time
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the charger to continue float-charging my motorcycle. I have to work the 2 wire connector in and out every couple of weeks because the indicator light will be off. Seems to work okay when it wants to. I've tried cleaning that connection multiple times and it always works out the same. Won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Works great - very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a garaged car for over two months. This worked great, maintained the battery charge and was very easy to use. My car did not need the battery clips as my inside charger is always on so it was very easy using basically the cigarette lighter adapter to trickle charge / maintain my battery for approximately 8 weeks..
customer_reviews.author: A Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have started using this on each of my tractor, mower welding machine and ranch truck. I no longer have to replace battery's every few months or wait to charge up the battery before use. This excellent charger/maintainer keeps every battery ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  save your MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Junk!!! It lasted long enough for me not to be able to return, exactly 6 weeks
customer_reviews.author: tmelsonjr

customer_reviews.title: Failed in three months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but for less than three months, they do have a 12-month warranty, but it would cost nearly half the purchase price of to send back and would the replacement be any better. I elected to buy another brand and I suggest you do too!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: If you don't use it, apparently you do lose it
customer_reviews.text: I like that is was affordable. I dislike the fact that it doesn't work. I used it when i first recieved it. No problems. Put it back in the box on a shelf. A few months later i needed it. Now it doesn't power on. And im more than likely at a loss
customer_reviews.author: SapperSean

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.  It appears the manufacturer's warranty isn't honored.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this and set it aside until needed. Seven weeks later it was needed so opened package for the first time and when I plugged it in, there was no power to the unit. I tried various way to contact the manufacturer without success.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this October 2018. Now March 2020 and it is dead. Hooks up and when on at 2 or 8 amp charge display charging then immediately show a full charge on two known dead batteries. Worked great for the 17 months I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe s.

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: An awesome inexpensive charger! I was low on cash when my alternator died. I was able to use this wonderful little charger to keep my battery charged for a month. It saved me hundreds on what I would have spent on uber rides for a month. My alternator is fixed now but thanks to this charger, I made it through a rough time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. White

customer_reviews.title: disappointed me yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One flashed rapidly and silently, thu other flashed slowly and audibly. Expected the slow one to die soon. That was five weeks ago and they both are doing their thing. Got a third one today and it's a rapid flasher. Gave it 5 stars because it hasen't. disappointed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles French

customer_reviews.title: Works well but clip wires too short
customer_reviews.text: Supplied clip wires are too short! Could not reach engine or frame with black clip. Had to use jumper cables to extend reach. Worked well to charge battery once hooked up. Will try cigarette lighter hook up next time.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It's reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I have the 8 amp version. I use this as a maintainer in winter, when I seldom drive and a maintainer is a must. After two winters, which is over a thousand hours of run time, it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Billfitz

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Battery
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of trouble with the battery on my motorcycle. Hooked it up to this charger and it was started every time since. Was afraid it might not work great since it was not very expensive but it has worked great thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job charging your battery
customer_reviews.text: Works as it supposed to!! Does a great job charging your battery, and maintaining it!! I use it on my motorcycle, and I've also used it on my riding lawn mower!! Great product! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Freiberg

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than a year and Amazon says I cannot get a refund. This should have lasted longer than that! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: David Watling

customer_reviews.title: No Storage Case & Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it was bigger and bulkier than I expected and no storage case came with it. Also, the clamp wires had to be connected to the clamps and I decided I didn't like this feature. I gave in and spent more money on one that was not as bulky and less wires to be connect to work.

customer_reviews.title: Great car battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Works with gel cell batteries and lead acid. Automatically senses and charges/maintains for you. Have been using for a few years before I bought this one for another car.

customer_reviews.title: ordered 3 months ago,still hasn't arrived

customer_reviews.title: Pays For Itself
customer_reviews.text: My car sat for a month and this charged my battery in under 5 hours. I did have to jump it with cables first and let it run for a few minutes. It was completely depleted and couldn't be detected at first, but once it had juice, it worked like a charm. It's automatic as it states and is a handy tool to have.

product_meta.title: STANLEY BC209 Fully Automatic 1.5 Amp 12V Battery Charger/Maintainer with Cable Clamps
product_meta.description: Size:1.5 AmpThe STANLEY BC209 high frequency battery charger and maintainer is used to keep batteries in stored vehicles and battery applications at optimal capacity during the off season. With 1.5 Amps of power, charges 12 volt AGM, GEL and WET batteries in RVs, specialty vehicles, antique and classic cars, marine deep cycle batteries, motorcycles, lawn mowers, ATVs, snowmobiles, and personal watercrafts. Connect the battery charger and maintainer with the included 12V DC accessory plug, battery clips, or battery ring terminals. Charging automatically stops when battery is fully charged or topped off and switches to float mode monitoring to maintain charge. Built-in circuit protection guards against overcharging, reverse polarity, or short circuit and is ETL certified for performance and safety. The STANLEY BC209 battery charger and maintainer has a built-in mounting bracket for convenient placement and includes a limited 1 year manufacturer warranty.
feature_bullets: Charges and maintains 12 volt AGM, GEL and WET batteries using 1.5 Amps of power
Easy connection to vehicle battery using battery clips, O-ring terminals, and DC accessory plug
Stops charging automatically when battery is fully charged or topped off, switching to float mode monitoring
Built-in circuit protection guards against overcharging, reverse polarity, or short circuit; ETL certified for performance and safety
Mounting bracket built-in to charger for convenient placement; Includes a limited 1 year manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars423 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars

categories: Jump Starters, Battery Chargers & Portable Power
